attributes.action: More help needed in mental health department
attributes.additional_details: Three months ago my little sister came out saying she has anorexia she saw a psychiatrist but now when she turned 18 she’s struggling to get help from the NHS due to the shortage of mental health nurses and NHS clinics.
attributes.background: I would like the government to give more funding for mental health on the nhs as there is a shortage of NHS mental health nurses and clinics.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Provide more funds and resources to Mental Health services & charities:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595467
